title: Tossed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of a chain with this one creating a different menu than the rest. You can build your own vegan salad, wrap, or sandwich or try the vegan tofu and vegetable wrap on the menu. Also the vegetarian roasted vegetable panini can be made vegan by asking for no cheese. Vegetarian salads are also on the menu and can be made vegan. Tofu, portobello mushrooms, edamame, and avocado are available for substitutions. All smoothies are vegan; flavors include banana, mango and peanut butter crunch. Online ordering available.
